name: gwaga adventure!
description:
[may take a while to load, so be patient] 

gwaga adventure! a stupid project I spent like a month working on, my first real project. don't expect it to be good, at all. but have fun atleast 

also the walls are really glitchy and easy to clip through, so to have a normal experience dont touch the walls much. 

oh and if the movement doesn't work, refresh and try again
